testcase.name: login with incorrect credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed When user enter "wrong_password1234" and "standard_user"....................passed And click on the "Login" button.............................................passed Then error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service" is displayed.passed

testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed When user enter "select * from users" and "standard_user"...................passed And click on the "Login" button.............................................passed Then error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service" is displayed.passed
